entry.title: New Publication: Volume XXXIV, National Security Policy, 1969–1972

author.name: Office of the Historian, U.S. Department of State

img.alt: Cover of Volume XXXIV, National Security Policy, 1969–1972

div.p: This volume documents U.S. national security policy in the context of the Vietnam War and the changing Cold War strategic balance between the United States and the Soviet Union.
